My email password has been hacked. That's the third time I've had to rename the cat.
What does a baby computer call it's father? Data.
Any room is a panic room if you've lost your phone in it.
Why did the developer go broke? Because he used up all his cache.
There are 10 types of people in the world: those who understand binary, and those who don't.
There are 10 types of people in the world: those who expected a binary joke, those who don't, and those who knew this was a ternary joke.

Is your name Wi-Fi? Because I'm feeling a connection.

As I handed my Dad his 50th birthday card, he looked at me with tears in his eyes and said: 
You know, one would have been enough.
If pronouncing my b's as v's makes me sound Russian, then soviet.

What goes down but doesn't come up?
 A yo.

Two men walk into a bar. The third man ducks.
I bought the world's worst thesaurus yesterday. Not only is it terrible, it's terrible.

I told my friend I was going to build us a car out of spaghetti. 
She said I was crazy and to stop making stupid comments.
You should have seen her face when I drove pasta.
Shout out to all the people who don't know the opposite of in.

Why do seagulls fly over the sea?
Because if they flew over the bay, they'd be bagels.

Why are a duck's feet webbed? - To stamp out forest fires.
Why are an elephant's feet flat? - To stamp out burning ducks.

Where do cows go to dance?
A meat ball.
I lost my mood ring the other day, and I don't know how I feel about that.

I answered, "No, is that still required?"
I asked my creator for a new phone. They said, "When your old one breaks.". I regret getting a Nokia 3310 now.
The police told me the other day that my dogs were chasing people on bikes. I didn't even know my dogs had bikes!
What month was the army invented? March!

 On the dork side of the moon.
I once knew an Irish man who could bounce off walls, his name was Rick O'Shea...

Because you can't tuna fish.

Why do fish have bad eyesight?
Because they live below see level.

They travel at c!

Drive a steak through its heart!
